item.title: NtGNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtGNL1 Gene Name: GNOM-like 1 protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtGNL1 is involved in embryonic cell division patterning, root elongation, and pollen tube growth in tobacco.

item.title: NtKRP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtKRP Gene Name: kinesin-related protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Ribosomal protein NtRPL17 interacts with kinesin-12 family protein NtKRP and functions in the regulation of embryo/seed size and radicle growth.

item.title: NtMATE21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE21 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion21 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMATE22 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion22 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtMATE21 and NtMATE22, and demonstrate their role in flavonol transport and in plant growth and development.

item.title: NtPDR3
